articles.title: Namibian President to visit DPRK
articles.content:
Namibian President to visit DPRK 
    Pyongyang, November 26 (KCNA) -- Namibian President Sam Nujoma will soon pay an official goodwill visit to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea at the invitation of President Kim Yong Nam of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
